code: import React from'react';import img from'../../images/color.steps.jpg';import logo from'../../images/logo.jpg';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{Nav,Navbar}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Header=function Header(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Navbar,{className:"flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{className:"w-100 d-flex justify-content-center border-bottom border-3 ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:img,height:"250px",className:"w-100",alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"w-100 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between p-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"d-flex align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{width:"100px",className:"rounded-circle me-5",src:logo,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-primary",children:"Color Your Steps"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/home",className:"bg-primary px-4 py-2 text-decoration-none fs-5 text-light rounded mx-3",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/classes",className:"bg-primary px-4 py-2 text-decoration-none fs-5 text-light rounded mx-3",children:"Classes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/services",className:"bg-primary px-4 py-2 text-decoration-none fs-5 text-light rounded mx-3",children:"Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/about",className:"bg-primary px-4 py-2 text-decoration-none fs-5 text-light rounded mx-3",children:"About"})]})]})]});};export default Header;
